name: The Quest for Coffee - Gameboy Color edition
name_original: The Quest for Coffee - Gameboy Color edition
description:
Thanks to efforts from asie, the coffee hunt The Quest For Coffee has now been ported to a format playable -with some graphical tweaks-on the Gameboy Color!

On the way back from your grocery run, you get a hankering for coffee. Will you be able to find some before the shops close? And can you do it on your Gameboy Color?

This game was written in the spring of 2020, when most of the world was only beginning to adopt lockdowns to contain the spread of COVID-19. I wrote it at a time when coffee shops where I live hadn't made up their mind if they should stay open for takeaway or hunker down until the lockdown lifted. This also explains the somewhat light-heartened tone of this game. 

The views on certain hot beverages expressed in the game are not the author's.
